section.heading: Establishment of the Department of Forensic Sciences.

para.text: There is established as a subordinate agency in the executive branch of the government of the District of Columbia, the Department of Forensic Sciences.
The mission of the Department shall be to provide high-quality, timely, accurate, and reliable forensic science services and public health laboratory services with:
The use of best practices and best available technology;
A focus on the delivery of unbiased science and an emphasis on promoting transparency in operations; and
The goal of enhancing public safety and the fair and balanced administration of justice.
